casebody.data:
Marlik MOURNING
v.
COMMISSIONER OF CORRECTION Supreme Court of Connecticut. Decided January 11, 2017 Peter G. Billings, assigned counsel, in support of the petition. Jennifer F. Miller, deputy assistant state's attorney, in opposition.

The petitioner Marlik Mourning's petition for certification for appeal from the Appellate Court, 169 Conn. App. 444 , 150 A.3d 1166 (2016), is denied.
